entity.name: Wilbur Ross
entity.description: US Secretary of Commerce Wilbur Ross

text: @GOP @SecretaryRoss Now that America is reopening, it should not take long for us to see just how rampant the coronavirus is, and how despicable the Trump administration is for putting people's lives at risk just to goose the economy in time for November election. Trump is losing big time.
